education: Gaoxiang Wu obtained his bachelor degree in University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC). He got national inspiration scholarship for several times. In September 2016, he was recommended for direct admission to Huazhong University of Science and Technology without entrance examination. Currently, he is a Phd candidate in Embedded and PervasIve Computing Lab at HUST. His research interests include congnitive system.
hobbies: Basketball , Reading Books, Singing, Watching Movie, Traveling, Board games.etc
